name: Insolent fools!
effects: Reduce chance of being targeted by 75%
Increase resistance to Silence and Confusion by 100%

name: Insolent fools!
無禮之徒
무례한 것!
Sombre fous !
Unverschämte Narren
¡Necios insolentes!
desc_short: Nullify silence and confusion and decrease chance of being targeted
沉默混亂無效+不易被敵人攻擊
침묵과 혼란 무효화+적의 공격 대상이 될 확률 감소
Annule silence et confusion et diminue les chances d'être ciblé
Annulliert Stille, Konfus und verringert die Wahrsch. zum Ziel zu werden.
Anula silencio y confusión y reduce la posibilidad de ser atacado
desc_long: Nullifies silence and confusion and decrease chance of being targeted.
沉默混亂無效，同時不易被敵人攻擊。
침묵과 혼란을 무효화하고, 적의 공격 대상이 될 확률이 감소합니다.
